Keywords: sharedpreferences plaintext storage token password

Mitigation: Use Keychain for sensitive data

Keywords: asyncstorage plaintext sensitive token password

Keywords: backup allowbackup data extraction adb
Description: App data included in device backups
Mitigation: Disable auto-backup or exclude sensitive files

Keywords: database sqlite encryption sqlcipher room coredata

Mitigation: Encrypt database with SQLCipher or equivalent

Keywords: clipboard copy paste sensitive password token

Description: No certificate pinning allowing MITM attacks
Mitigation: Implement certificate or public key pinning

Keywords: http cleartext plaintext traffic unencrypted

Mitigation: Define network_security_config.xml with strict rules

Keywords: ats app transport security http exception nsallows

Mitigation: Only add specific domain exceptions

Mitigation: Send tokens in Authorization header only

Description: Not validating API response integrity
Mitigation: Validate response signatures and checksums

Keywords: biometric fingerprint faceid weak fallback crypto
Description: Biometric auth with weak fallback

Keywords: token expiry refresh rotation jwt access
Description: No token expiration or refresh mechanism

Keywords: session timeout inactivity auto logout lock
Description: No automatic session timeout
Mitigation: Implement inactivity timeout with re-authentication

Keywords: hardcoded password api key secret source code
Description: Credentials embedded in source code
Mitigation: Use environment variables or secure config

Keywords: pin hash bcrypt plaintext storage argon2
Description: Storing user PIN in plain text
Mitigation: Hash PINs with bcrypt/Argon2 and salt

Keywords: proguard r8 obfuscation decompile reverse engineer
Description: No code obfuscation in release builds
Mitigation: Enable R8/ProGuard with proper rules

Keywords: debug release build production debuggable flag
Description: Shipping debug build to production
Mitigation: Always ship release builds with debug disabled

Keywords: root jailbreak tamper detection integrity check
Description: No root/jailbreak detection
Mitigation: Detect rooted/jailbroken devices for sensitive apps
Code Good: Check for su binary Magisk Cydia

Keywords: webview javascript injection xss evaluate interface
Description: Insecure WebView configuration
Mitigation: Disable unnecessary WebView features restrict JS
Code Good: Disable file access restrict to allowList URLs

Keywords: encryption algorithm aes md5 sha1 weak des
Description: Using deprecated/weak crypto algorithms
Mitigation: Use AES-256-GCM for encryption SHA-256+ for hashing
Code Bad: DES or MD5 for sensitive data

Keywords: hardcoded key encryption secret constant embedded
Description: Encryption keys embedded in code
Mitigation: Use Keystore/Keychain for key storage
Code Good: Generate key in Keystore at runtime

Keywords: random prng seed predictable token
Description: Using predictable random number generator
Mitigation: Use SecureRandom/SystemRandomNumberGenerator

Keywords: key rotation encryption periodic renew cycle
Description: Never rotating encryption keys
Mitigation: Implement periodic key rotation strategy
Code Good: Rotate keys every 90 days migrate data

Keywords: intent hijacking exported component broadcast receiver
Description: Exported components accessible to malicious apps
Mitigation: Set exported=false or use permissions

Keywords: url scheme deeplink hijacking universal links
Description: Custom URL schemes can be hijacked
Mitigation: Use Universal Links instead of custom schemes

Keywords: screenshot task switcher sensitive screen blur
Description: Sensitive screen visible in app switcher
Mitigation: Add blur/overlay when app enters background

Keywords: tapjacking overlay touch filtering attack
Description: Overlay attacks tricking user into actions
Mitigation: Use filterTouchesWhenObscured
Code Bad: No touch filtering on sensitive actions

Keywords: sql injection query parameterized prepared
Description: Raw SQL queries with user input
Mitigation: Use parameterized queries/prepared statements

Keywords: log sensitive password token pii production debug
Description: Logging credentials/PII in production

Description: User input not sanitized before display
Mitigation: Sanitize and escape all user-generated content

Keywords: debug endpoint test api production remove
Description: Debug/test API endpoints in production code
Mitigation: Remove all debug endpoints and test configs

Keywords: verbose error message stack trace user production
Description: Showing stack traces or internal errors to users

Keywords: outdated dependencies vulnerabilities patch update version
